comments.body: For this bug report template, be good to clarify here that users should ask for help debugging their code on SO rather than issues (in case people don't click through to the issue policy)

diffHunk:

Thank you for submitting an issue. Please refer to our [issue policy](https://www.github.com/mlflow/mlflow/blob/master/ISSUE_POLICY.md)
for information on what types of issues we address.
